db:abstract.db:para: The QVideoDeviceSelectorControl class provides an video device selector media control.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The QVideoDeviceSelectorControl class provides descriptions of the video devices available on a system and allows one to be selected as the endpoint of a media service.
The interface name of QVideoDeviceSelectorControl is org.qt-project.qt.videodeviceselectorcontrol/5.0 as defined in QVideoDeviceSelectorControl_iid.

db:section.db:title: [explicit protected] QVideoDeviceSelectorControl::QVideoDeviceSelectorControl(QObject *parent = Q_NULLPTR)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a video device selector control with the given parent.

db:section.db:title: [virtual noexcept] QVideoDeviceSelectorControl::~QVideoDeviceSelectorControl()
db:section.db:para: Destroys a video device selector control.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] int QVideoDeviceSelectorControl::defaultDevice() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the index of the default video device.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] int QVideoDeviceSelectorControl::deviceCount() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the number of available video devices;

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QVideoDeviceSelectorControl::deviceDescription(int index) const
db:section.db:para: Returns a description of the video device at index.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QVideoDeviceSelectorControl::deviceName(int index) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the name of the video device at index.

db:section.db:title: void QVideoDeviceSelectorControl::devicesChanged()
db:section.db:para: Signals that the list of available video devices has changed.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] int QVideoDeviceSelectorControl::selectedDevice() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the index of the selected video device.

db:section.db:title: void QVideoDeviceSelectorControl::selectedDeviceChanged(const QString &name)
db:section.db:para: Signals that the selected video device name has changed.

db:section.db:title: void QVideoDeviceSelectorControl::selectedDeviceChanged(int index)
db:section.db:para: Signals that the selected video device index has changed.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QVideoDeviceSelectorControl::setSelectedDevice(int index)
db:section.db:para: Sets the selected video device index.
